extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate Impact of Vulnerability
extracted_playbook.description: Evaluate the impact of the vulnerability based on operational environment, architecture, and product implementation.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to AVEVA System Platform 2023 R2 P01
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade all affected versions to AVEVA System Platform 2023 R2 P01 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to AVEVA System Platform 2023 P04
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Historian 2023 through 2023 P03 to AVEVA System Platform 2023 P04 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to AVEVA System Platform 2020 R2 SP1 P01 and Apply Hotfix 3190476
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Historian 2020 R2 through 2020 R2 SP1 P01 to AVEVA System Platform 2020 R2 SP1 P01 and apply Hotfix 3190476.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Source of URLs for Historian REST Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Establish procedures for Historian REST Interface users to verify the source of URLs shared with them is trusted before opening.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Social Engineering Protections
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
